/usr/local/cuda-12.5/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -g --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[compute_86,sm_86] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/cal_padding_offset.dir/cal_padding_offset.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/cal_padding_offset.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
